name: CouchPotatoVr
description:
very very early prototype (3-5 hours of work) of a Vr game idea. Just wanted to implement an idea of a card throwing game I had and built a level around the mechanic. It will most likely be an adventure game where the player fights like gambit from x men or a casual game just like this one with much more polishing. 

Controls: 

Cant move from the couch. You spawn cards by holding grip and throw by releasing grip with a throwing motion. Shoot the red bricks. You need to turn off the lights, turn on the TV and turn on the PS in order to feel like you won then exit the program with ALT-F4 :).
